website_summaries.verdict: Adorable boho style chair that will be a nice addition to your favorite corner of the house, or a large tree in your yard.
pros: Sturdy design – can hold up to 265 pounds
We found the Sorbus chair to be the one of the most spacious
There was lots of room for extra pillows and blankets
cons: Not a lot of lower back support
Try adding some throw pillows for extra support

customer_reviews.title: The Good & the Bad
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love, love, love these chairs. I saw a storm brewing on Christmas morning if i only bought one and decided to get one for each sister. They are nuts about these chairs! Built well, nice decor for their rooms, very comfortable. The Bad: The installation is a bit of work. Hardware is anchored to stud in ceiling to make them safe and holds up to 250lbs. Worth the trouble when you see what a hit these make for the recipients, any gender, any age, indoors or out.
customer_reviews.author: EmmagirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love this swing so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing so much. It is PERFECT for my home office. I have purchased more as gifts because my friends and family loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: John and Krystina

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased this! I love my new swing chair and so does my 8 y.o.daughter!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new hammock swing chair! Great quality and comfortable! Looks great in my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.  These are great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these ... and then bought two more. I have these hanging in my living room, and they are perfect. You can hang them from a single hook or from two separate hooks. There are two rings. I have each swing hanging from a single hook (you just put both rings over the same one). The quality is fantastic. and the price was great. Maybe just promotional pricing since it's a new product, but I'm pretty sure this is the same quality as the swings that cost almost double the price. Go for it. You won't regret it. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This Hammock Chair Macramé Swing is a fun addition to our child's room
customer_reviews.text: This Hammock Chair Macramé Swing is a fun addition to our child's room. The swing was delivered quickly and we have since had no issues with the Macramé shedding or falling apart. To sit in it, the back hoop can be uncomfortable and there is no lower back support, but with a few throw pillows, that issue is solved. (I am 5' 6" and when I sit in it the back hoop is at the base of my head.) It adds a bit of whimsy which we love. Dimensions: seat diameter = 25" from base of seat to where the back hoops sits at it's highest = 21"
customer_reviews.author: amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful swing for outdoors ,indoors anywhere really,we have it in our backyard . Came on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteB.

customer_reviews.title: Macrame Prozac
customer_reviews.text: If I had to pick one product to stand by for all of eternity, it would be this swing. First of all, it’s darling. We could start and end with its Anthro-Free People vibe alone. But those websites would sell it for an amount comparable to your mortgage and this little number is so ridiculously reasonable, it’s almost wasteful not to buy it. You can buy a pair and not be stuck slurping ramen for the rest of the month. Also, this swing is like therapy. But cheaper. Pop in some ear buds, hop in, close your eyes and swing. You’re practically a Buddhist monk you’re so chill. Phone ringing? Kids yelling? House on fire? Whatever. You’re swinging.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Becca

customer_reviews.title: Yes please!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Adorable. Adorable. And comfortable. A new twist to a nursery glider. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!! Super comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a long time for a set of chairs for my children’s play area and finally I found these through amazon prime!!! I was being very picky ordering online because 1 I live in Alaska and once you order returning can be a pain so I wanted something good! And also you just don’t know what your going to get when you order online, well these have exceeded my expectations! They are very comfy, can fit me and my two younger children comfortably, the kids love them, we are all around very happy and satisfied with the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly murdock

customer_reviews.title: Not straight
customer_reviews.text: the chair looks amazing, but that is where it ends. After installing, the chair seating area is tilted toward the back. when sitting in it I fall back into it and cannot get out. I am strongly considering returning the chair since it is a flawed design. the back rope need to be shorter in order for the sitting area to be fully usable. I will try to somehow shorten the rear strings and if cannot do it the amazing chair is going to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bandi

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these. One came and was just as described. The second one was manufactured incorrectly, with the ropes blocking the front of the chair preventing anyone from sitting in it. They accepted the return, however I had to repackage and mail it back in, which I found a waste of my time. They did not offer a discount or accommodation for sending a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Circus performers beware!
customer_reviews.text: The rope part of the swing is very sturdy, however the frame is not as hardy and will pop out of the outer piece sometimes. In all fairness-my kids use this swing like a darn trapeze so it’s not surprising that it protests every once in a while. If you sit and swing like a civilized person-you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but ropes are too short
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is nice and seems well constructed. Ok comfort for an adult but more geared to a child or teen. My one complaint is that the ropes are far too short to hang from a normal ceiling unless you want the chair 4 feet off the ground. You'll need some supplemental rope to go along with the hanging hardware or ceiling hooks which are also not included.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last month, to hold onto a SURPRISE our daughter for her birthday today. We did buy the additional hardware because I noticed it recommended below the pic. However, I didn't realize we would have to buy additional rope, and no clue what I need. It would be great if it was recommended with the hardware, since there's no way my 7 year old can hang a couple feet from the ceiling. The ropes should be much longer. The swing itself is gorgeous but it's disappointing that I assumed I bought everything I needed, and now have to go on a hunt today to complete her gift.
customer_reviews.author: AWard

customer_reviews.title: Fun and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 yr/o's room makeover. She loves it and curls up in it most days. She piles in the pillows and blankets to make the ropes cozy. I had my dad, who built houses for a living, install it for me to make sure it was secure but I think as long as you use a stud finder and have a good screw driver, anyone can do this. We purchased the 1000 lb capacity Heavy Duty Hammock hanging kit because this seat does not come with hardware. This is a fun alternative to a regular chair or bean bag.
customer_reviews.author: KrisSquared

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and met all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and met all my expectations. I chose to hang with two chains instead of using additional rope to the mount; mostly to eliminate any stretch factor. Chain was inexpensive at the hardware store; I also bought Quick Links so I could easily adjust height too. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R

customer_reviews.title: This fits everyone.
customer_reviews.text: The last swing I purchased, my kids outgrew in six months. I desperately needed something, because my youngest is autistic. She needs to be in her own space. The child pictured, is her older sister... and, is actually swinging in it (while oblivious to me). This fits everyone. It is always in use. I think the cats will sit in it when we get a cushion for it. It’s already sturdy and good looking. But a cushion will be very nice.
customer_reviews.author: CI Norrod

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Tempted to order another. Received several compliments. My 3 yr old loves to play on it and I use put it in the babies room for night time feedings. Looks great and kids love it Update: ordered that second one for the living room, my husband hung it with chain and added a spring. The kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids/teens or smaller people.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. She is 5’ and 130 lbs. this is perfect for her to sit and do homework. I believe this holds up to 250. I believe the circle parts are just pvc type plastic tubes , definitely not made for heavier people. I’m 230lbs and I would not dare sit in it. The macrame is nice. I purchased a soft blanket to sit on and a large pillow for the back of it. Make sure you find the studs in the ceiling before you attempt to hang up. Also, we purchased chain and porch swing screws to hang it up. The ones it comes with don't seem strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but needs a seat pillow
customer_reviews.text: Once I got this hung at the height I wanted it became my favorite chair. It's roomy, but also feels very cozy. It swings a little bit witch boosts my mood. The seat is woven onto a rigid circular frame, so you sink down a bit. If you want your feet off the ground like I do, the back of your legs will press against the circular frame, so a pillow is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Briony Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair!!!! Seriously my favorite part of my bedroom decor! It’s not the most comfortable but I’m thinking I can add a pillow, blanket and work with that. It’s very sturdy. I weigh 120 and my 2 children have a combined weight of 110. We all sit together in the chair fairly often and it holds up great! We did have to buy an additional rope (pictured) otherwise it would have been too high. Installation was fairly easy as well. We bought a hook at a hardware store drilled a hole and that was it... no climbing in the attic. Seriously recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Not only is it beautiful decor that ties in with the whole boho theme, but it is also pretty comfortable (if you’re about 5’2 it might hurt your neck if you’re in it too long) and it can fit up to 2 kids or 1 large adult, it also swings really nice and never feels like it will fall from the ceiling! Highly recommend! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: LEVI

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT hammock chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely exactly what I wanted. It's off in color so it matches all color schemes. All the hardware is included. Attached right onto the chair stand with no hardware required. Perfect height. Didn't have to make any adjustments. I can sit indian-style with plenty of room. And I'm ordering my second one right now!
customer_reviews.author: SHOP 907

customer_reviews.title: The CIA should patent this for interrogations
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be waterboarded while sitting on your screened-in porch enjoying the summer birds, order this. If you'd like to relax and be able to carry on a conversation without guests laughing hysterically while you flail around like a netted trout trying to get comfortable, order this. If you just want a great porch swing or trendy looking hanging chair, pay for the comfort. Learned from my mistakes and order a comfortable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for smaller people or kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our outdoor area. I am 5’2” and the chairs fit me just right. I could take a nap in them. And as any kid would love a swinging chair, mine do as well. The husband however, is partial. He is 5’11” and he fits very awkwardly in them but wants to love them... so he makes it work. We secured them with climbing rope from the rafters. So far they’re holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Decorative Accessesory!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a private patio off my living room that you look out onto...I just wanted a cool decorative accessory to compliment my decor. This is fantastic...was the perfect accessory!!! Everyone that comes to my house always compliments and wonder where I purchased...You cannot go wrong buying this....would look great inside or out. I already had a hook which was cemented into the patio roof...I just went to the hardware store and bought some Chain and 2 S hooks for $8.00....I had it hung in less than 3 minutes! Love This!!
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Boho reading swing!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! My 3 year old loves it in her room as her “reading swing”.... difficult to mount... Had to buy extra rope and a stud finder to make sure it was secure, but after about an hour it was installed. We love it! Added round pillow and a floating hanging vine for the whimsical effect
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: You sit lower in the chair then the picture so it is more comfortable then it looks
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's room. The chair looks so cute. You sit lower in the chair then the picture so it is more comfortable then it looks. The only problem which I was able to find out from another person's review is you have to add chain or rope because the swing does not come with enough length to hand directly from the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It came perfectly and looked just like it did in the photos. I did have to buy extra chain to hang it, and that took about 2 ft. on each side. My complaint is that in the front of the chair, the rope doesn’t cover the entire frame, so there’s a few gaps where the wood frame is exposed. My other complaint is I had to knot the end of every tassel to keep them from fraying. Overall, though, it’s a great chair and I’m flying bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Well made and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's room to replace her Sorbus bassinet and she loves it. Her bassinet was listed as beige so I got this in beige too and I figured since being from the same company they would match in color but they don't. This is truly beige and her bassinet is ivory compared to it. Still beautiful though and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! I hung it in our guest room and my family just loves it. So comfortable and beautiful. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Not DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: While we love the look and comfort of this swing, after using it in our sun room for just 4 months the swing completely broke. Thankfully my daughter noticed it before anybody got hurt but definitely be aware that this swing is not made to last. So dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: It isn't balance or designed in a way that is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When sitting in the chair you are forced forward into a slouch because of the overall design. There is nothing about sitting in this chair that I would consider comfortable in the least. Additionally the chair has very short cords to hang from requiring additional hardware/purchases to hang the chair low enough to get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Karras

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice but...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom has started to sag after only a month and we had to buy a 22 inch round cushion. I will also say that if they had made the two back ropes independent from the two front ropes then I would’ve been able to adjust the angle backwards or forwards in which to increase comfort while sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: BluesHarp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived just as described and appears to be pretty durable. This is in a guest room so it won’t be used often so it will probably hold up well since it is more of a decor piece but it strong and sturdy and I would recommend this and buy it again as well
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Green chair for my teen daughter's bedroom
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my teen daughter's bedroom and it's perfect. Fairly easy to install with the help of Lowe's. She's gotten so much positive feedback about it. I'm sure many of her friends will be looking to buy. Very good value. It's much sturdier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kallay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful swing
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's WONDERFUL! I'm impressed at how comfortable this chair is! It's currently hanging in the wife's "pink room" Had to purchase hardware from amazon & Home Depot. The rope stretches a few inches once you sit in it so keep this in mind when hanging the chair at a certain level.
customer_reviews.author: Agent S

customer_reviews.title: Lasting & beautiful swing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this swing for 5 or so months and it’s still in great shape! I use it outside in our yard so the sun is always beating down on it (I take it in at night) and there is no signs of wear or stress. My husband myself and my daughter have all used it. Very happy that I chose this brand.
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11 yr old granddaughters bedroom...she loves it! I dont know about 260 lbs but her and I can both sit in it and snuggle. Have only had about a month so gave durability 3 stars. Cost about adsl $15.00 for hanging hardware and chain. It stretches when you get in so bought to much chain.
customer_reviews.author: dtjosie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a coffee in the morning
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely perfect. It looks amazing, is super comfy, and is big enough you can add pillows and not be cramped. I can fit my large 4 yr old on it and be comfortable enough he can get drowsy.
customer_reviews.author: sarah brook

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren (and I) love this chair swing!
customer_reviews.text: I attached mine to my pergola. (Actually, I had my handyman do the work to make sure it was safe.) Haven't had it long enough to comment on its durability. It definitely needs cushions for comfort. It is lovely to swing and read a book on those beautiful days outside.
customer_reviews.author: Moondance

customer_reviews.title: Had to return (2) of these before we even used them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered (2) of these and had to return (2) of them. The first one had the ropes on the wrong configuration and the second one wasn’t the correct length. I would say the quality control of whoever makes these is lacking... it is too early in the game to say anything else about them. This isn’t starting off on the correct foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Chairs for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these chairs for my porch. They are beautifully made and comfortable. They give you a weightless relaxing vibe. After you've sat in them for a while they are hard to get back out of though. Ive also noticed the suspension ropes stretch and elongate the more they are used. I ordered extension ropes to suspend them by and after a few uses had to remove them because the chairs were hanging too low. Given the braided threaded material, this stretch should be expected but was poorly thought out on my end when ordering. Great chairs for the price, my daughters love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommakat

customer_reviews.title: It's such an adorable chair!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly haven't actually sat in it, because I have it hanging with pillows in my shop - it's so stinking cute! when I did sit in it, I sank about 3 feet down, which is fine, but it looks cute in the shop with stuff in it! The price is amazing, since most of the other macramé chairs I've seen that I like are much more than double the price of this one! Leave it to Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Abiad

customer_reviews.title: Fair but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea. Frame is aluminum and not very sturdy. Cracked the second I put in the support screws. Also, does not come with any type of straps or hooks of any sort to hang. It’s like buying a bicycle with no wheels.
customer_reviews.author: BLC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but will need to buy extra items
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and daughter loves it! We needed the buy an additional rope for without the rope the swing was too high. We also needed to buy a hook and carabiner and a block of wood to help support it as where we wanted it installed there were no support beams. We had a friend who was handy install it. The swing itself is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Forever young

customer_reviews.title: The most fun you can have outdoors with your clothes on
customer_reviews.text: This swing is everything I hoped. It spins and swings and almost has a perpetual motion. It seems sturdy enough for most of the humans in my family. I can't say about durability as it was just installed 2 days ago. If it doesn't last forever I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJo Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Love swinging?
customer_reviews.text: This is is a really cute and comfortable swing! Be sure to have a stand or somewhere to hang it! I really like it because it is unusual! really cute!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Chair Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This chair has been a great addition to my 12 yr old daughter's room. She loves it! It's very sturdy. I purchased a round pillow for her to sit on as the macrame is a little tough on the legs & butt. Found the round cushion at Target. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This chair was even better than I expected. The comfort level even without a pillow is great. It is a great chair and I can’t wait to purchase another one. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great, cute, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy, comfortable little hammock chair. I placed this outside under our awning and my girls love it. They can swing safely. I love it for reading. It also looks super cute. I weigh about 140 and my child weighs about 60, we got comfortably. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, hope it holds up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a little hang out area we have in our yard. Overall this chair is great but I'm worried about how well it will hold up. The ropes seem kind of weak and stretch a lot after hanging. I'm only 130lb and it seemed like the supports were already struggling. Hopefully it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: CarolynTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Swing Chair!😍
customer_reviews.text: This swing chair is very sturdy, very comfy, and very structured (in a good way). It does not come with parts, it only comes with the chair. If you want parts, you can order them separately. Anyway, this is an amazing product, and has lasted me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: 😄

customer_reviews.title: Second time I have ordered this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have one in my living room and gave one as a christmas gift. So cute and such great quality. Don't forget to order the extenders to hang from the ceiling!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it
customer_reviews.text: Like swing overall, did not like how it is kind of tilted back when sitting in it. Added some pillows for comfort. Some kind of hanging system would benifit product. Luckily I had a previous swing from ikea and used those anchors and rope otherwise would of had to figure something out.
customer_reviews.author: P. Charron

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Sorbus Hammock Chair Macrame Swing. It is totally affordable and unbeleively comfortable!! I’m moving into a Farm Style Home this upcoming july and it fit the style of my room perfectly. Although this product was great for me, I would’ve loved to receive the parts to hand the chair. When it came in the mail I was super excited to hang it but in the process of opening it, i realized there was no rope or string to hang it with. If i has to do it over i defiantly still would’ve purchased this item. It is a GREAT fit for me:))
customer_reviews.author: Ramsie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our best and useful purchases recently. Every one in our family is enjoying it and my baby easily fall asleep in this. This gave us so much peace as it was hard for us to get her to bed. She likes it a lot and never come out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jagan Gorre

customer_reviews.title: Description and recommendations are pretty bad, sorry
customer_reviews.text: The chair is nice, really comfortable and easy to install. I purchased the recommended mounting brackets and hardware along with the additional rope to hang from the ceiling. My problem is the color of the rope doesn't match and looks hideous. I'm aware this has nothing to do with the chair, but the chair is advertised as a hanging chair for children's bedrooms, why isn't the length of the rope long enough and where can I purchase matching rope to look right?
customer_reviews.author: Robert chateau

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Seem Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in our college rental house, however, when I took it out of the box, I didn't feel like it was sturdy enough for everyday use with 6 girls. I ended up returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great. Very sturdy. I did purchase the installation brackets and an extender based on another person's review/recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are sweet!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are sweet! I want one for myself. Installed one in each of the kids rooms and I enjoy sitting there and swinging in it as long as they let me. Don’t skimp on the install! Make sure you have a large bolt with swivel to install into the ceiling joist.
customer_reviews.author: SPARK

customer_reviews.title: make sure support clips aren't 3/8 unless you use heavy chain
customer_reviews.text: love them bought 2 and they went up fairly easy, just make sure support clips aren't 3/8 unless you use heavy chain. I ended up using 5/16 clips they hold 500lbs
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed okay but the straps were sewn on incorrectly. They were criss-crossed instead of straight, making the chair unusable.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Extra pieces required
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair! It took me a bit to figure all the extra pieces I needed to buy and one trip to the hardware store but other than that it’s great. I weigh about 120 and so far it holds up fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute perfect BOHO accent
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Had to buy mounting hardware and heavy duty chain to hang it up which I had expected. Looks adorable and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: NurseLovesDeals

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a tween room.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughters room. Its got more structure then some other hammock swings making it more comfortable and nicer looking. But its not so big that it takes up a ton of space. She has already used this a ton!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is exactly as described. The plan is to use this outdoor. I just hung it up for my 15 year old daughter. She is very happy with this. My only drawback to this item is that it does not come with the accessories to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby F.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and boho!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect touch to my daughter’s enchanted woohdland theme bedroom. I may purchase a stand rather than hang from ceiling so it can be moved easily.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and we LOVE them! Perfect size! Fits perfect in the rooms we put them in! Everyone wants to sit in them! Super comfy and the bohemian feel we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: A gift for our tween daughter who is a bohemian at heart. Had to add 4’ of rope to each side to hang from ceiling and hung in her bedroom and she loves it. Even comfortable for me size wise. Now I’m thinking of purchasing a couple for our covered patio.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Very cute hanging chair.
customer_reviews.text: I rely heavily on reviews before I buy things so I have to leave feedback for this item. I looked at tons of hanging chairs and even bought another one from pier 1 but the size of this one is just perfect for my daughter bedroom. She says it is very comfortable and we just have a couple pillows to lean on and she loves it. It is so cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Great design and value
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with these hammock chairs. We made them into swings for our outdoor patio underneath our balcony. Quality and value is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It's pretty comfortable. Very relaxing to sit and swing in it. You will need to buy the rope extenders unless your ceilings are less than like six feet high.
customer_reviews.author: Christine F

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and received two different colored round bars under the stitching of the product. That’s the only downside. But the price makes it worth it! Durable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Comfortable and Attractive!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this swing for our vacation house and we love it so much. It’s amazing for the kids to play on on a rainy day or whenever, and the adults love it too. It easily holds and adult and child together or two kids. It’s extremely sturdy, comfortable and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Middle River Mama

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this swing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this swing! It adds such a cute vibe to my room and allows me to swing in the comfort of my own room at such an affordable price. I placed a comforter over it and a throw pillow, absolutely love this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Tori McMoore

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these for down at the creek side. Lots of fun for kids or adults. We just keep some nice, snuggle big pillows in them and it’s a great place to sit with a book or have a friendly conversation.
customer_reviews.author: M A Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: My husband hung this up for me a couple weeks ago !! I totally love it! Is holding up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: John N Miranda Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I’ve made in awhile! I was concerned that these wouldn’t be comfortable or sturdy but I was seriously wrong. My daughter can’t get enough. She spends more time on our porch reading and rocking. We love our new hammock chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Featherfur

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing we use it all the time in the summer and it looks really cute hanging from my tree in the yard , I fix it up with pillows and a throw
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is adorable and my grandbaby loves it. I enjoy it also but I wouldnt reccomend a large adult swing in it, it is macrame and stretches. I am very happy with it and plan to bring it inside to hang upstairs during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Foust

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Love it! When we hung it we didn’t figure in that the material would stretch a little with the weight. We had to re adjust itbutbwqs no big deal.. I think it’s beautiful and my daughter loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Colman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, big and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really big chair. My 15 yr old daughter loves it and it was an awesome addition to her room. You do have to buy additional chain and the ceiling fasteners. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my porch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 weeks. I am very happy with it. I hung it so I can swing in circles. I put pillows in it for extra comfort. It is very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: A D

customer_reviews.title: So fun and comfy
customer_reviews.text: So cute in our playroom. We bought hardware from Home Depot to hang it, and used a video off YouTube for instructions. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Swinging into the 70s
customer_reviews.text: I love my hanging chair. It is beautiful to look at and beautifully made. I was nervous at first but it is as sturdy as any other chair. Very pleased! I weigh 190# and my boyfriend 220#, we each got in it (separately) and felt completely safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mardee Faulder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfy chair!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Person who usually sits in it weighs about 115 lbs and the chair is perfect and not stretching out with use. Sometimes even used by someone at 175 lbs and still, holds up great!
customer_reviews.author: 5. Wars

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly cute chair!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this chair! She’s been asking for one forever but I was never able to locate one I felt was a reasonable price. This is the perfect option for us and goes great in her “boho chic” room.
customer_reviews.author: M Green

customer_reviews.title: Great hanging chair!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves! Perfect for a teen room. Well made and sturdy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Teniece Price-williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids!!! A little uncomfortable on the back of the legs with adults.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and arrived in good condition and on time. One of the chairs tend to lean back more than the other so they dont hang quite the same.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I hung the chair on a stand on my patio. It is sturdy and absolutely adorable. The only negative is that it’s not exactly the most comfortable after some time (more than an hour) but will do for brief usage.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous57

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super cute and everyone compliments it when they come into my living room. I just wish it was more comfortable to sit and lounge and for long periods of time. Really boho/chic.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair
customer_reviews.text: Very cute chair. There was a small defect where one of the pieces of rope was not attached to the chair (see picture) but I was able to sew it so it at least came back together somewhat. I can hide the defect with a blanket and not overall that big of a deal. Goes great in my meditation room and seems to be sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaP

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this chair for a week but I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Comfortable and easy to hang! Be sure to purchase the hanging brackets and ropes that are sold separately. This chair does not come with hanging equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: can't say enough love love love its a huge eye catcher for our ...
customer_reviews.text: can't say enough love love love its a huge eye catcher for our quests and my cat loves to chill on them , takes weight well , all of our guest chill there enjoying their coffee , price u can't beat LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Better than the hammock style.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’m glad I returned the hammock style and ordered this one. So much better!! 100% 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it one thing to note if you install it like the photo shows you will need to get some sort of extenders Because the chair will be about 3’ off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved her hanging chair for her bedroom. Cute n durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Sorbus Hammock Chair Macrame Swing, 265 Pound Capacity, Perfect for Indoor/Outdoor Home, Patio, Deck, Yard, Garden (Single Swing)
product_meta.description:
Size:Single SwingSwing into relaxation with the Sorbus Macramé Hammock Chair! 

This trendy hammock chair swing is the perfect addition to your home, patio, or garden. It features a sturdy frame for durability with tasteful bohemian style for a casual-retro touch. When you’re ready to relax and unwind, hang it from any sturdy overhang to create a cozy resting spot. It’s versatile enough to function as hammock chair for lounging or to display as a unique centerpiece. Great for any season, you'll be swinging in style from almost any location you desire! 

From the bedroom to the patio, this swing is a cozy way to enjoy every minute of your leisure time. 

Lounge around the patio all season long or enjoy adventure in the most unexpected places. Hang your swing in the bedroom anytime you need to curl up and "get away" or mount it in a playroom, living room, or sunroom. Spend the day reading on the deck, relaxing by the pool, or nestling into a "cocoon" on the patio. As night falls, gaze at the stars from your hammock with a view that puts you in the best seat in the house. When you’re ready to re-locate, simply transport this lightweight swing to your next destination. It can be moved anywhere from the front porch in the spring to inside the home during winter. 

Designed with superior strength and easy to set up so you can relax right away! 

It's easy to hang from a ceiling, tree, or any sturdy overhang that can support your weight. The rope and swing design features macramé net with fringe tassels . Made of 100% handmade cotton. Hand wash to clean. Protect from outdoor elements. Weight capacity is 265 pounds. Entire Unit Measures approximately 31.75" L X 24.50" W X 54" H (Height of chair only, without rope is 19”).
feature_bullets: HAMMOCK CHAIR MACRAME SWING — Relax and unwind with a hanging macrame hammock swing chair — Complements any setting for cozy resting spot

COMFORTABLE & RELAXING — The macrame swing net chair can be used as a light cradle and swing reading chair or relaxing meditation chair — Makes a sweet snuggle swing to hang outside and enjoy nature, rest under the sunset, relax poolside, or lounge on the deck — Nestle into cozy "cocoon" while reading — Listen to the sound of rain, crickets, bird chirping, or quiet night of stargazing, etc

FOR INDOOR/OUTDOOR — Great addition to home, bedroom, sunroom, kid’s room, living room, and more — Adds charm to garden, yard, patio, deck and garden — Versatile enough to function as hammock chair, room display, or one of a kind piece of art

PORTABLE & EASY TO HANG — Portable hammock relocates almost anywhere — Sets-up in minutes — Lightweight and easy to store and carry — Easy to hang from ceiling, tree, or any sturdy overhang that can support your weight

STURDY & STYLISH DESIGN — Handmade bohemian chic hammock style swing brings style and unique touch to any home —The rope and swing design features macrame net chair pattern with fringe tassels — Made of 100% handmade cotton — Hand wash — Protect from outdoor elements — 265 pound weight capacity — Entire Unit Measures approximately 31.75" L X 24.50" W X 54" H (Height of chair only is 19”)
